backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that includes blob storage mixin and provides contact form submission functionality with methods to submit, retrieve all, and filter submissions by project type or email.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: responsive grid layout for PortfolioGallery and fixing broken image paths for 120 portfolio images across 4 categories.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, UI primitives, and configuration files for the Casa Di Vida interior design website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color system for light and dark themes, including warm earth tones and gold accents for luxury design aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and title for Casa Di Vida Interior Decoration and Designs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders Navigation, all main sections (Hero, Services, Portfolio, About, Contact), Footer, and Toaster with smooth scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying Casa Di Vida's design philosophy, company values (Passion, Excellence, Client-Centered, Timeless Beauty) in a grid layout with icons and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: React Hook Form-based contact form with validation for name, email, phone, project type, and message fields, integrated with backend submission via useContactSubmission hook and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section wrapper displaying ContactForm alongside business contact information (email, phone, location) and office hours in a two-column layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Casa Di Vida branding, quick navigation links with smooth scrolling, contact information, and copyright notice with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component with full-screen background image, Casa Di Vida branding, call-to-action buttons for contact and portfolio, and an animated scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with smooth scrolling to sections, active section highlighting, responsive mobile sheet menu, and background blur effect on scroll.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioGallery: Portfolio gallery component with tabbed categories (home, office, commercial) displaying project images in a grid with modal dialog for detailed views and descriptions.
Services section displaying four interior design services (Space Planning, Color Consultation, Furniture Selection, Full Room Design) in a card grid with icons and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, caching via React Query, and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
React hook providing a mutation for submitting contact form data to the backend actor with automatic query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind configuration defining a luxury interior design color scheme using warm earth tones, creams, and gold accents with Playfair Display and Inter fonts.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme with custom colors (oklch-based luxury palette), typography, animations, and design tokens for the interior design aesthetic.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining Casa Di Vida interior design website requirements including hero section, services, 120-image portfolio gallery across 4 categories, about section, and contact form with backend integration.
